alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 05 at 9:22PM AKST until February 06 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Yakutat. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures have remained near freezing, resulting in significant snow accumulation through the evening. Temperatures are now expected to remain steady, resulting in an additional 5 to 7 inches of snowfall overnight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area
